Text:
This is Norwegian subtitle for Dexter.S02E09.720p.HDTV.x264-CTU.mhv

Only Subtilte File.

Question: How to use this subtitleor any subtitle  file? btw I use WMP 11 and VLC. 

Thanks for sharing!

Just make sure the sub file have exactly the same name as the video file. The sub file should also ends with a .srt in its file name. When you play the video file, VLC media player looks for the .srt file with the same name as the video file and then display the movie with subs.

Example:
Batman.avi should have a batman.avi.srt file in the same directory, and VLC displays the sub when playing the avi.
